name: What They Don't Tell You About Living In New York
name_original: What They Don't Tell You About Living In New York
description:
What They Don't Tell You About Living In New York is an in-development sandbox Bullet Hell RPG taking place in New York City.

The game is inspired by JRPGs, Roguelikes, and American Football.

Fight Demons in NYC Skyscrapers using your latent Psychic abilities!

Enhance your Psychic abilities through the use of Psionics, and combine Psionics to increase your power!

How High Can You Get?

Future Development Plans:

Better Graphics (not programmer art)

More levels and abilities

Build out NYC more; create NPCs to talk to, stores to enter, and apartments to rent!
